item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Scott and I am a Data Scientist/Engineer based in Scotland. I’d describe myself as a life long learner, which is part of the reason why I have made this site. I’m trying to make an effort to share what I’ve learned to both help highlight areas that I need to work on and hopefully help/entertain you the reader. My career to date has allowed me to accumulate a wide array of knowledge across the data and tech fields.
